trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around July 2nd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsReport taken by phone by ASD: I was leaving work at 18th and Holmes and saw some orange lighs in the sky headed from west to east. I was looking north at the time. These were orange color orbs mving in an even trajectory and were moving past the top of and just above the buildings downtown. One went in front of a building. There was no noise and no flickering. They appeared to be about 5 - 10 feet wide each. The objectes moved up gradually and went out of sight. The witness is sending a video.
Summary: Several orange orbs pass downtown Buildings in KC
